blackcoffee.title: Black Coffee
blackcoffee.process_jargon: 1. Brew coffee grounds with hot water and serve plain.
process_easy: Add ground coffee to a filter or French press.
Pour hot water over the coffee grounds.
Let it steep for a few minutes.
Pour the coffee into a cup and enjoy it plain (no milk or sugar).

whitecoffee.title: White Coffee
whitecoffee.process_jargon: 1. Brew coffee, pour over milk and serve.
process_easy: Brew a cup of coffee using your preferred method.
Pour the hot coffee into a cup with some cold or evaporated milk.
Stir gently and enjoy.

kopiluwak.title: Kopi Luwak
kopiluwak.process_jargon: 1. Brew coffee with civet-processed beans and serve black.
process_easy: Use civet-processed coffee beans (these beans are eaten and passed by civet cats, making them rare).
Brew the coffee as you would regular coffee (drip, French press, etc.).
Serve the coffee plain, without milk or sugar.

bulletproofcoffee.title: Bulletproof Coffee
bulletproofcoffee.process_jargon: 1. Brew black coffee. Blend with butter and MCT oil until creamy.
process_easy: Brew a cup of black coffee.
Add a spoonful of butter and a little MCT oil (a type of healthy fat, optional).
Blend everything together until the drink looks creamy and smooth.
Pour into a mug and enjoy while hot.

cafetouba.title: Café Touba
cafetouba.process: 1. Roast coffee with grains of Selim and cloves. Brew and sweeten to taste.

cafecubano.title: Café Cubano
cafecubano.process: 1. Brew espresso. Whip with sugar to create espuma. Serve in small cups.

kopijahe.title: Kopi Jahe
kopijahe.process: 1. Brew coffee with ginger. Add sugar if desired. Serve hot.

cafedeolla.title: Cafe de Olla
cafedeolla.process: 1. Boil water with cinnamon and piloncillo. Add coffee, simmer briefly. Strain and serve.

cafebrulot.title: Café Brûlot
cafebrulot.process: 1. Combine brandy, orange peel, cloves, cinnamon, and sugar. Ignite, then pour over coffee. Serve hot.

redtie.title: Red Tie
redtie.process: 1. Brew Thai tea and espresso. Pour over ice with condensed milk. Serve chilled.

cafelecheyleche.title: Café Leche y Leche
cafelecheyleche.process: 1. Add condensed milk to a glass. Pour in espresso and steamed milk. Serve hot.

cafezorro.title: Café Zorro
cafezorro.process: 1. Brew a double shot of espresso. Add equal part hot water. Serve immediately.

kopisusu.title: Kopi Susu
kopisusu.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add sweetened condensed milk. Stir and serve hot or iced.

einspanner.title: Einspänner
einspanner.process: 1. Brew strong coffee. Top with whipped cream. Serve in a glass.

cafeborgia.title: Café Borgia
cafeborgia.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add orange zest and chocolate. Top with whipped cream.

yuanyang.title: Yuanyang
yuanyang.process: 1. Brew coffee and milk tea. Mix together with sugar. Serve hot or iced.

blacktie.title: Black Tie
blacktie.process: 1. Brew Thai tea and espresso. Pour over ice with condensed milk. Serve chilled.

dirtychai.title: Dirty Chai
dirtychai.process: 1. Brew chai tea and espresso. Mix with steamed milk. Serve hot.

kopiguyou.title: Kopi Gu You
kopiguyou.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add a pat of butter. Stir and serve hot.

caphesuada.title: Cà Phê Sữa Đá
caphesuada.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add sweetened condensed milk. Pour over ice and serve.

espressoconpanna.title: Espresso con Panna
espressoconpanna.process: 1. Brew espresso. Top with whipped cream. Serve immediately.

cafemela.title: Café Méla
cafemela.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add honey and steamed milk. Serve hot.

marocchino.title: Marocchino
marocchino.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add cocoa powder and milk foam. Serve in a small glass.

melya.title: Melya
melya.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add honey and cocoa powder. Top with whipped cream.

cafecanadien.title: Café Canadien
cafecanadien.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add maple syrup and milk. Serve hot.

cafeviennois.title: Café Viennois
cafeviennois.process: 1. Brew coffee. Top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

cafedublin.title: Café Dublín
cafedublin.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add whiskey and sugar. Top with cream. Serve hot.

cafelagrima.title: Café Lagrima
cafelagrima.process: 1. Steam milk. Add a drop of espresso if desired. Serve hot.

cafemelange.title: Café Melange
cafemelange.process_jargon: 1. Brew coffee. Top with whipped cream. Serve hot.
process_easy: Brew a cup of coffee using your preferred method.
Pour the coffee into a mug.
Add a generous spoonful of whipped cream on top.
Enjoy while hot.

cafemarocain.title: Café Marocain
cafemarocain.process_jargon: 1. Brew coffee with spices. Add sugar to taste. Serve hot.
process_easy: Add ground coffee and your favorite spices (like cinnamon or cardamom) to a coffee maker or pot.
Pour hot water over the mixture and let it brew.
Strain the coffee into a cup.
Add sugar to taste and stir.
Enjoy while hot.

coffeetonic.title: Coffee Tonic
coffeetonic.process: 1. Brew espresso. Pour over tonic water and ice. Serve chilled.

portuguesemazagran.title: Portuguese Mazagran
portuguesemazagran.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add lemon juice and sugar. Pour over ice and serve.

biedermeierkaffee.title: Biedermeier Kaffee
biedermeierkaffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add apricot liqueur. Top with whipped cream.

caferoyal.title: Café Royal
caferoyal.process: 1. Place sugar cube in a spoon, soak with brandy, ignite, and drop into coffee. Serve hot.

cafecreme.title: Café Crème
cafecreme.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add heavy cream. Serve hot.

cafeaubeurre.title: Café au Beurre
cafeaubeurre.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add butter and stir. Serve hot.

eggcoffee(scandinavia).title: Egg Coffee (Scandinavia)
eggcoffee(scandinavia).process: 1. Mix egg with coffee grounds and water. Boil, strain, and serve hot.

kopijoss.title: Kopi Joss
kopijoss.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add a piece of burning charcoal. Serve hot.

pharisaerkaffee.title: Pharisäer Kaffee
pharisaerkaffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add rum. Top with whipped cream.

cafeconhielo.title: Café con Hielo
cafeconhielo.process: 1. Brew coffee. Pour over ice. Add sugar if desired.

cafecorrecto.title: Café Correcto
cafecorrecto.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add a splash of liquor. Serve hot.

kopitarik.title: Kopi Tarik
kopitarik.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add condensed milk. 'Pull' the coffee between two vessels to froth. Serve hot.

cafefrances.title: Café Francés
cafefrances.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add cognac and sugar. Serve hot.

wienermelange.title: Wiener Melange
wienermelange.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add milk and top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

affogatoalcaffe.title: Affogato al Caffè
affogatoalcaffe.process: 1. Place a scoop of vanilla ice cream in a bowl. Brew espresso and pour over ice cream. Serve immediately.

iceddirtyhorchata.title: Iced Dirty Horchata
iceddirtyhorchata.process: 1. Fill a glass with ice. Add horchata and espresso. Stir and serve chilled.

cafebarroco.title: Café Barroco
cafebarroco.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add chocolate and cinnamon. Mix with milk. Serve hot.

whitemocha.title: White Mocha
whitemocha.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add white chocolate and steamed milk. Serve hot.

sweetcreamcoldbrew.title: Sweet Cream Cold Brew
sweetcreamcoldbrew.process: 1. Pour cold brew coffee over ice. Top with sweet cream. Serve chilled.

caphesuanong.title: Cà Phê Sữa Nóng
caphesuanong.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add sweetened condensed milk. Serve hot.

kopicham.title: Kopi Cham
kopicham.process: 1. Brew coffee and tea. Mix with condensed milk. Serve hot or iced.

spicedcoffee.title: Spiced Coffee
spicedcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee with spices. Serve hot.

mochavalencia.title: Mocha Valencia
mochavalencia.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add chocolate, orange syrup, and steamed milk. Serve hot.

irishcreamcoffee.title: Irish Cream Coffee
irishcreamcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add Irish cream liqueur. Top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

cafeamaretto.title: Café Amaretto
cafeamaretto.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add amaretto liqueur. Top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

cinnamonrollcoffee.title: Cinnamon Roll Coffee
cinnamonrollcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add cinnamon, vanilla, and milk. Serve hot.

maplepecancoffee.title: Maple Pecan Coffee
maplepecancoffee.process_jargon: 1. Brew coffee. Add maple syrup, pecan flavor, and milk. Serve hot.
process_easy: Brew a cup of coffee using your preferred method.
Add a splash of maple syrup and a little pecan flavoring (if available).
Pour in some milk and stir well.
Enjoy your coffee while hot.

almondcoffee.title: Almond Coffee
almondcoffee.process_jargon: 1. Brew coffee. Add almond syrup and milk. Serve hot.
process_easy: Brew a cup of coffee.
Add a splash of almond syrup and some milk.
Stir and enjoy while hot.

spanishcarajillo.title: Spanish Carajillo
spanishcarajillo.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add brandy or Licor 43. Serve hot.

viennesemelange.title: Viennese Mélange
viennesemelange.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add milk and top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

turkishmenengic.title: Turkish Menengic
turkishmenengic.process: 1. Cook menengic paste with milk and sugar. Serve hot.

chococcino.title: Chococcino
chococcino.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add chocolate and steamed milk. Serve hot.

icedlemoncoffee.title: Iced Lemon Coffee
icedlemoncoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add lemon juice and sugar. Pour over ice and serve.

roselatte.title: Rose Latte
roselatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add rose syrup and steamed milk. Serve hot.

butterscotchcoffee.title: Butterscotch Coffee
butterscotchcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add butterscotch syrup and milk. Serve hot.

maplecreamcoffee.title: Maple Cream Coffee
maplecreamcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add maple syrup and cream. Serve hot.

hazelnutcoffee.title: Hazelnut Coffee
hazelnutcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add hazelnut syrup and milk. Serve hot.

cardamomcoffee.title: Cardamom Coffee
cardamomcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee with cardamom. Add sugar if desired. Serve hot.

toastedmarshmallowcoffee.title: Toasted Marshmallow Coffee
toastedmarshmallowcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add toasted marshmallow syrup and milk. Serve hot.

javachipcoffee.title: Java Chip Coffee
javachipcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add chocolate chips and milk. Serve hot or iced.

maplecinnamoncoffee.title: Maple Cinnamon Coffee
maplecinnamoncoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add maple syrup, cinnamon, and milk. Serve hot.

coffeesangria.title: Coffee Sangria
coffeesangria.process: 1. Brew coffee. Mix with fruit juice, citrus, and sugar. Pour over ice and serve.

gingercoffee.title: Ginger Coffee
gingercoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee with ginger. Add sugar if desired. Serve hot.

almondjoycoffee.title: Almond Joy Coffee
almondjoycoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add almond syrup, coconut, chocolate, and milk. Serve hot.

bostonicedcoffee.title: Boston Iced Coffee
bostonicedcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add milk and sugar. Pour over ice and serve.

honeybeecoffee.title: Honey Bee Coffee
honeybeecoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add honey and milk. Serve hot.

blackforestcoffee.title: Black Forest Coffee
blackforestcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add chocolate and cherry syrup. Top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

espressolemonade.title: Espresso Lemonade
espressolemonade.process: 1. Brew espresso. Mix with lemonade. Pour over ice and serve.

hazelnutcoldbrew.title: Hazelnut Cold Brew
hazelnutcoldbrew.process: 1. Pour cold brew coffee over ice. Add hazelnut syrup. Serve chilled.

irishmochamint.title: Irish Mocha Mint
irishmochamint.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add chocolate, mint syrup, and Irish cream liqueur. Top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

cafefrappefloat.title: Café Frappe Float
cafefrappefloat.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add ice cream and ice. Add sugar if desired. Serve chilled.

almondbuttercoffee.title: Almond Butter Coffee
almondbuttercoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add almond butter and milk. Serve hot.

caramelbrulee.title: Caramel Brûlée
caramelbrulee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add caramel syrup and milk. Top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

bourboncoffee.title: Bourbon Coffee
bourboncoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add bourbon whiskey and sugar. Top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

chaispicedmocha.title: Chai-Spiced Mocha
chaispicedmocha.process: 1. Brew espresso. Add chai spices, chocolate, and steamed milk. Serve hot.

blueberrylatte.title: Blueberry Latte
blueberrylatte.process_jargon: 1. Brew espresso. Add blueberry syrup and steamed milk. Serve hot.
process_easy: Brew a shot of espresso (or strong coffee).
Add blueberry syrup to the espresso.
Pour in steamed milk and stir gently.
Enjoy your blueberry latte while hot.

horchatacoffee.title: Horchata Coffee
horchatacoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add horchata. Pour over ice and serve.

whitechocolateraspberrycoffee.title: White Chocolate Raspberry Coffee
whitechocolateraspberrycoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add white chocolate, raspberry syrup, and milk. Serve hot.

lavendercoffee.title: Lavender Coffee
lavendercoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add lavender syrup and milk. Serve hot.

coffeegintonic.title: Coffee Gin Tonic
coffeegintonic.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add gin and tonic water. Serve over ice.

pandancoffee.title: Pandan Coffee
pandancoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add pandan syrup and milk. Serve hot.

walnutcoffee.title: Walnut Coffee
walnutcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Add walnut syrup and milk. Serve hot.

cardamomicedcoffee.title: Cardamom Iced Coffee
cardamomicedcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee with cardamom. Let cool. Pour over ice. Add sugar and milk if desired.

figcoffee.title: Fig Coffee
figcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. Stir in fig syrup. Add milk if desired. Serve hot.

saltedhoneycappuccino.title: Salted Honey Cappuccino
saltedhoneycappuccino.process: 1. Brew a shot of espresso. Steam milk and mix with honey and a pinch of salt. Pour milk over espresso. Serve hot.

coffeebramble.title: Coffee Bramble
coffeebramble.process: 1. Brew coffee and let cool. Add blackberry syrup and lemon juice. Shake with ice and strain into a glass. Serve chilled.

chestnutpralinecoffee.title: Chestnut Praline Coffee
chestnutpralinecoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee as desired. Add chestnut praline syrup to taste. Stir in milk and sugar if desired. Serve hot.

corretto.title: Corretto
corretto.process: 1. Brew a shot of espresso. 2. Add a splash of grappa or sambuca. 3. Serve immediately.

espressomartini.title: Espresso Martini
espressomartini.process: 1. Brew a shot of espresso and chill. 2. Shake espresso, vodka, liqueur, and syrup with ice. 3. Strain into a martini glass. 4. Garnish with coffee beans.

greek.title: Greek Coffee
greek.process: 1. Combine coffee, water, and sugar in a briki. 2. Heat slowly, do not stir after foam forms. 3. Pour into a small cup, let grounds settle. 4. Serve unfiltered.

eiskaffee.title: Eiskaffee
eiskaffee.process: 1. Brew and chill strong coffee. 2. Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream to a tall glass. 3. Pour coffee over ice cream. 4. Top with whipped cream.

shakerato.title: Shakerato
shakerato.process: 1. Brew a shot of espresso. 2. Shake with ice (and sugar if desired) in a cocktail shaker. 3. Strain into a chilled glass.

conleche.title: Café con Leche
conleche.process: 1. Brew strong coffee. 2. Add equal part steamed milk. 3. Serve in a large cup.

gibraltar.title: Gibraltar
gibraltar.process: 1. Brew a double shot of espresso. 2. Add 90ml steamed milk. 3. Serve in a Gibraltar glass.

blackeye.title: Black Eye
blackeye.process: 1. Brew a cup of drip coffee. 2. Add two shots of espresso. 3. Stir and serve.

americano.title: Americano
americano.process: 1. Brew a shot of espresso. 2. Add hot water to dilute. 3. Serve hot.

breve.title: Breve
breve.process: 1. Brew a shot of espresso. 2. Steam half-and-half. 3. Pour over espresso and serve.

brownsugarshakenespresso.title: Brown Sugar Shaken Espresso
brownsugarshakenespresso.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Shake with brown sugar and ice. 3. Top with milk.

butterscotchlatte.title: Butterscotch Latte
butterscotchlatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add butterscotch syrup. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

cafeaulait.title: Café au Lait
cafeaulait.process: 1. Brew strong coffee. 2. Steam milk. 3. Mix equal parts and serve.

cappuccino.title: Cappuccino
cappuccino.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add equal parts steamed milk and foam. 3. Serve hot.

caramelmacchiato.title: Caramel Macchiato
caramelmacchiato.process: 1. Add vanilla syrup to cup. 2. Pour in steamed milk. 3. Brew espresso and pour over. 4. Drizzle caramel sauce.

caramelsaltedcoldbrew.title: Caramel Salted Cold Brew
caramelsaltedcoldbrew.process: 1. Pour cold brew over ice. 2. Add salted caramel syrup. 3. Stir and serve.

chocolatecoldbrew.title: Chocolate Cold Brew
chocolatecoldbrew.process: 1. Pour cold brew over ice. 2. Add chocolate syrup. 3. Stir and serve.

cinnamonicedcoffee.title: Cinnamon Iced Coffee
cinnamonicedcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. 2. Add cinnamon and sugar. 3. Pour over ice and serve.

coconuticedcoffee.title: Coconut Iced Coffee
coconuticedcoffee.process: 1. Pour cold brew over ice. 2. Add coconut milk. 3. Stir and serve.

coldbrew.title: Cold Brew
coldbrew.process: 1. Combine coffee and water. 2. Steep in fridge 12–24 hours. 3. Strain and serve over ice.

cortado.title: Cortado
cortado.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add equal amount steamed milk. 3. Serve in small glass.

dalgona.title: Dalgona Coffee
dalgona.process: 1. Whisk instant coffee, sugar, and hot water until frothy. 2. Fill glass with milk and ice. 3. Spoon whipped coffee on top.

espresso.title: Espresso
espresso.process: 1. Use 7–9g finely ground coffee per shot. 2. Brew at 90–96°C for 25–30 seconds. 3. Serve in demitasse cup.

espressomilkshake.title: Espresso Milkshake
espressomilkshake.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Blend with ice cream and milk. 3. Serve chilled.

espressotonic.title: Espresso Tonic
espressotonic.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Pour over tonic water and ice. 3. Serve chilled.

filtercoffee.title: Filter Coffee
filtercoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee using filter method. 2. Add milk and sugar if desired. 3. Serve hot.

flatwhite.title: Flat White
flatwhite.process: 1. Brew double shot espresso. 2. Steam milk to microfoam. 3. Pour over espresso.

frappe.title: Frappe
frappe.process: 1. Mix instant coffee, sugar, and water. 2. Shake or blend until frothy. 3. Pour over ice, add milk if desired.

french.title: French Press Coffee
french.process: 1. Add coffee grounds to French press. 2. Pour hot water and stir. 3. Steep 4 minutes. 4. Press plunger and serve.

galao.title: Galão
galao.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add 3 parts foamed milk. 3. Serve in tall glass.

hazelnutlatte.title: Hazelnut Latte
hazelnutlatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add hazelnut syrup. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

honeyalmondlatte.title: Honey Almond Latte
honeyalmondlatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add honey. 3. Pour steamed almond milk over and serve.

icedamericano.title: Iced Americano
icedamericano.process: 1. Fill glass with ice. 2. Brew espresso. 3. Pour espresso over ice. 4. Add cold water and stir.

icedblackcoffee.title: Iced Black Coffee
icedblackcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. 2. Pour over ice and serve.

icedcaramelmacchiato.title: Iced Caramel Macchiato
icedcaramelmacchiato.process: 1. Add vanilla syrup to glass. 2. Add ice and cold milk. 3. Brew espresso and pour over. 4. Drizzle caramel sauce.

icedcoffee.title: Iced Coffee
icedcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee double strength. 2. Let cool. 3. Fill glass with ice. 4. Pour coffee over ice, add milk and sugar.

icedlatte.title: Iced Latte
icedlatte.process: 1. Fill glass with ice. 2. Brew espresso. 3. Pour espresso over ice. 4. Add cold milk and stir.

icedmacchiato.title: Iced Macchiato
icedmacchiato.process: 1. Fill glass with ice. 2. Brew espresso. 3. Pour espresso over ice. 4. Add cold milk and stir.

icedmocha.title: Iced Mocha
icedmocha.process: 1. Fill glass with ice. 2. Brew espresso. 3. Add chocolate syrup and cold milk. 4. Stir and serve.

icedpumpkinlatte.title: Iced Pumpkin Latte
icedpumpkinlatte.process: 1. Mix pumpkin puree, spice, and sugar. 2. Brew espresso. 3. Add pumpkin mix. 4. Add cold milk and ice. 5. Stir and serve.

latte.title: Latte
latte.process: 1. Brew a fresh shot of espresso. 2. Steam milk until velvety. 3. Pour steamed milk over espresso. 4. Top with thin layer of foam.

lavenderlatte.title: Lavender Latte
lavenderlatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add lavender syrup. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

lungo.title: Lungo
lungo.process: 1. Brew espresso with double the usual water. 2. Serve in a larger cup.

macchiato.title: Macchiato
macchiato.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add a dollop of milk foam on top. 3. Serve immediately.

maplecinnamonlatte.title: Maple Cinnamon Latte
maplecinnamonlatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add maple syrup and cinnamon. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

matchaespressofusion.title: Matcha Espresso Fusion
matchaespressofusion.process: 1. Prepare matcha and milk. 2. Add ice. 3. Pour espresso over the top.

mazagran.title: Mazagran
mazagran.process: 1. Brew strong coffee and let cool. 2. Add lemon juice and sugar. 3. Pour over ice and serve.

mintmocha.title: Mint Mocha
mintmocha.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add chocolate and mint syrups. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

mocha.title: Mocha
mocha.process: 1. Add chocolate syrup to cup. 2. Brew espresso over syrup and stir. 3. Steam milk and pour over. 4. Top with whipped cream.

neworleansiced.title: New Orleans Iced Coffee
neworleansiced.process: 1. Brew cold brew with chicory. 2. Add milk and ice. 3. Serve chilled.

nitrocoldbrew.title: Nitro Cold Brew
nitrocoldbrew.process: 1. Infuse cold brew coffee with nitrogen. 2. Serve chilled.

oliveoilcoffee.title: Olive Oil Coffee
oliveoilcoffee.process: 1. Brew coffee. 2. Add olive oil and stir. 3. Serve hot.

orangeespresso.title: Orange Espresso
orangeespresso.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add orange juice and ice. 3. Stir and serve.

peppermintmocha.title: Peppermint Mocha
peppermintmocha.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add chocolate and peppermint syrups. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

peppermintwhitemocha.title: Peppermint White Mocha
peppermintwhitemocha.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add white chocolate and peppermint syrup. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

piccolo.title: Piccolo Latte
piccolo.process: 1. Brew a ristretto shot. 2. Add steamed milk in a small glass. 3. Serve immediately.

pumpkinspicelatte.title: Pumpkin Spice Latte
pumpkinspicelatte.process: 1. Mix pumpkin puree, spice, and sugar. 2. Brew espresso. 3. Add pumpkin mix. 4. Pour steamed milk, top with whipped cream.

ristretto.title: Ristretto
ristretto.process: 1. Use 7g finely ground coffee per shot. 2. Brew with half the water of a standard espresso. 3. Serve in a demitasse cup.

romano.title: Espresso Romano
romano.process: 1. Brew a shot of espresso. 2. Serve with a thin slice of lemon on the rim.

saffronlatte.title: Saffron Latte
saffronlatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add saffron syrup. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

spicedeggnoglatte.title: Spiced Eggnog Latte
spicedeggnoglatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add eggnog and spices. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

swissmocha.title: Swiss Mocha
swissmocha.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add chocolate. 3. Pour steamed milk over. 4. Top with whipped cream.

tiramisulatte.title: Tiramisu Latte
tiramisulatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add mascarpone and cocoa powder. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

toffeenutlatte.title: Toffee Nut Latte
toffeenutlatte.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add toffee nut syrup. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.

turkishcoffee.title: Turkish Coffee
turkishcoffee.process: 1. Combine coffee, water, and sugar in a cezve. 2. Heat slowly, stirring, until foam forms. 3. Pour into a small cup, let grounds settle. 4. Serve unfiltered.

vienna.title: Vienna Coffee
vienna.process: 1. Brew two shots of espresso. 2. Top generously with whipped cream. 3. Serve without stirring.

viennese.title: Viennese Coffee
viennese.process: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add chocolate. 3. Top with whipped cream.

affogato.title: Affogato
affogato.process_jargon: 1. Scoop vanilla ice cream into a glass. 2. Pour hot espresso over the ice cream. 3. Serve immediately.
process_easy: Put a scoop of vanilla ice cream in a small glass or cup.
Make a shot of espresso (strong coffee).
Pour the hot espresso over the ice cream.
Serve right away while the ice cream is melting.

bananacoffeesmoothie.title: Banana Coffee Smoothie
bananacoffeesmoothie.process_jargon: 1. Brew coffee and let cool. 2. Blend with banana, milk, honey, and ice. 3. Serve chilled.
process_easy: Make coffee and let it cool down.
Put the cooled coffee in a blender.
Add a ripe banana, some milk, honey, and ice cubes.
Blend everything until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and enjoy your smoothie!

blackforestmocha.title: Black Forest Mocha
blackforestmocha.process_jargon: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add chocolate and cherry syrups. 3. Pour steamed milk over. 4. Top with whipped cream.
process_easy: Make a shot of espresso (strong coffee).
Add chocolate syrup and cherry syrup to the cup.
Pour steamed milk over the coffee and syrups.
Top with whipped cream and serve.

chilimocha.title: Chili Mocha
chilimocha.process_jargon: 1. Brew espresso. 2. Add chocolate syrup and chili powder. 3. Pour steamed milk over and serve.
process_easy: Make a shot of espresso (strong coffee).
Add chocolate syrup to the cup.
Sprinkle a little chili powder for heat.
Pour steamed milk over everything.
Stir gently and enjoy the spicy chocolate coffee!

doppio.title: Doppio
doppio.process_jargon: 1. Use 14-18g finely ground coffee. 2. Brew double shot of espresso. 3. Serve in a larger cup.
process_easy: Use twice as much coffee grounds as a regular espresso.
Brew the coffee using an espresso machine.
The result is a double shot of strong coffee.
Serve in a larger cup than a regular espresso.

irishcoffee.title: Irish Coffee
irishcoffee.process_jargon: 1. Warm a glass with hot water. 2. Add sugar and whiskey. 3. Pour hot coffee and stir. 4. Float whipped cream on top.
process_easy: Warm a glass by filling it with hot water, then pour it out.
Add sugar and Irish whiskey to the warm glass.
Pour hot coffee into the glass and stir well.
Gently float whipped cream on top (don't stir it in).
Serve while hot with the cream floating on top.

redeye.title: Red Eye
redeye.process_jargon: 1. Brew a cup of drip coffee. 2. Add one shot of espresso. 3. Stir and serve.
process_easy: Make a regular cup of coffee using your preferred method.
Make one shot of espresso (strong coffee).
Pour the espresso into the regular coffee.
Stir well and enjoy the extra strong coffee!
